topInfoContentTitle: PK4ID business and management solutions for individuals and enterprises
topInfoContentSubTitle: Unified management in one tool. Synchronized between mobile and website. Simple, easy to use
weAreHereToHelp: We are here to help make your business easier
weAreHereToHelpSub: BigSeller is a simple, easy-to-use, and highly automated multi-channel sales management SaaS system. Using BigSeller, you can list products and process orders more efficiently, helping you save time and increase sales.
problemCheckManual: Frequent direct supervision required at workplace
toActiveEffect: Efficient operation is essential for business
dotNotDependence: Paper records are no longer crucial as computers can handle everything
easyToCheck: Easy to monitor multiple branches remotely at once
aboutUsContent: Synchronize multi-channel multi-shop products with one click, edit and post products in bulk
state3Content: 1st prize by Bitangels at CoinAgenda, Las Vegas
processHandelOrderContent: Develop smart order processing solutions to maximize order handling efficiency
updateOrderStatusContent: Support customization of delivery note templates according to needs
syncWarehouseContent: System automatically checks and synchronizes, manages multi-platform inventory, prevents overselling
addImageProductContent: Support adding frames to product images to create unique product presentation
smartReportContent: Multi-dimensional data reporting for accurate data analysis, grasp business situation
logisticSupportContent: System automatically tracks package delivery to check latest shipping information
productManagementContent: Synchronize multi-channel multi-shop products with one click, edit and post products in bulk
productManagementContent1: Copy & move data, automatic category mapping
productManagementContent1Sub: Import multi-channel products to help expand brand with just one click
productManagementContent2Sub: Helps you quickly optimize product titles, descriptions, adjust prices and inventory, and add image frames super fast
productManagementContent3: Sync and list products across platforms
productManagementContent3Sub: Supports synchronization and product listing on 10+ E-commerce platforms in Southeast Asia such as Shopee, Lazada, Tiktok, Tokopedia, etc.
dataManagementContent: Accurately analyze sales data, profits, inventory movements and delivery data!
dataManagementContent1Sub: Statistics and analysis of sales data, orders and stores from multiple perspectives to help sellers manage sales accurately!
dataManagementContent2Sub: Collect over 10 cost data points such as promotions, commissions, taxes, etc. and break down costs by product level for more accurate calculations!
dataManagementContent3Sub: Synchronize inventory data from multiple warehouses and display them in various aspects such as new products, bestsellers and stock items, support purchasing and sales strategies!
orderManagementContent: Automatically synchronize orders in real-time, process multi-platform multi-channel orders on a single interface screen
orderManagementContent1: Real-time order synchronization and order processing
orderManagementContent1Sub: Synchronize new orders from multiple platforms, arrange and track order status changes on the platform.
orderManagementContent2: Customize Delivery Note, Packing List and Pack List templates
orderManagementContent2Sub: The system provides various document templates for sellers to choose print content according to needs, while supporting delivery note printing through print utilities
orderManagementContent3Sub: Unsigned return orders can be processed for warehouse entry, supporting full entry, partial entry or no processing
slogan: PK4ID_Reliable partner of businesses in Vietnam
downloadAppNowSub: PK4ID app helps you manage your business anytime, anywhere
scanQRCode: Scan QR code to download app
subSlogan: Manage your store more easily with the best experience starting now
